error-boundary-list-item-1: For the beginning, press the F5 key on your keyboard. In case the error is not serious, it will help.
error-boundary-list-item-2: If the error repeats and pressing F5 does not help, try opening other pages of the site and press F5: for example,
error-boundary-list-item-3: If other pages of the site available, but only the current one is unavailable, try to return to it after a while. It is possible that preventive maintenance is being carried out on the site.
error-boundary-list-item-4: If the error on this page is repeated constantly, write to us about it with a detailed description: in which case it appears, which page url, which error text ({{error}}), which mail you are registered on our site â€” to the address support@pma.by.
error-boundary-list-item-5: If the site is unstable, most of the pages are unavailable, it means that the problem is serious and it is already being dealt with. Please be patient.
